description:
Changing [GNOME Default] to [No Action] for top left Corner now disables the top left overview. Moving the [Show Overview] to the top right corner works fine.

Bottom left has default of [No Action], but interferes with the category based "Applications" menu is that has been enabled: The Applications menu no longer shows, until CustomCorners is disabled.
Like the title says I couldn't get it to work on ubuntu 18.04 - will try custom hot corners next.
summary: It worked great once... and never again

description: Works on Ubuntu 19.10, should be installed by default. Then again you need tweakui...
Die Erweiterung ist perfekt und sollte von Haus installiert sein.
summary: Sollte von Haus aus installier sein ( Ubuntu 18.04 )
